content:

Action:2

I will move left to intercept the bombs before they reach the base.

Okay, I see a lot of aliens spawning at the top of the screen. There are also bombs that I need to destroy. My avatar is currently at (10, 20). I should move up and shoot the aliens before they get to the base. I'll move left first to clear aliens near the base, then use the missiles.

Feedback: Move left to intercept the incoming aliens and clear the area near the base.

The strategy is to protect the base from aliens and bombs, and eliminate enemies. Bombs pose immediate danger so I will move left to eliminate the bombs.
